Documentation

playerDraw Source #

Arguments

:: Int

the number of the paddle. (1 for the player paddle, anything else for the AI paddle)

-> Float

the x-coordinate of the center of the paddle

-> Float

a number used to generate the inner color of the paddle

-> Picture

the resulting picture

Draws a paddle for a specified player according to its position.

ballDraw Source #

Arguments

:: Point

the (x,y)-coordinates of the ball

-> Float

a number used to generate the inner color of the ball

-> Picture

the resulting picture

Draws the ball according to its position.

displayTime Source #

Arguments

:: Float

a number used to generate the color of the text

-> World

the current world

-> Picture

the resulting picture

Draws the game time of a world.

victory Source #

Arguments

:: Float

a number used to generate the color of the text

-> World

the current world

-> Picture

the resulting picture

Draws a victory screen for a given world. Displays the total time of the game.

defeat Source #

Arguments

:: Float

a number used to generate the color of the text

-> World

the current world

-> Picture

the resulting picture

Draws a defeat screen for a given world. Displayes the total time of the game.

leaderboardSort :: [Record] -> [Record] Source #

Sorts a list of game records.

leaderboard :: IO Picture Source #

The top-10 scores of all time as a picture wrapped in IO context.

idle Source #

Arguments

:: Color

the color of the title text

-> IO Picture

the resulting picture to be used in an IO context.

Generates an idle-screen wrapped in IO context with a given color.

pause Source #

Arguments

:: Color

the color of the title text

-> IO Picture

the resulting picture to be used in an IO context.

Generates a pause-screen wrapped in IO context with a given color.

worldDraw Source #

Arguments

:: World

the current world

-> IO Picture

the resulting picture to be used in an IO context.

A picture of a world wrapped in IO context.
